ygData.subject: Armor & Absorption
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yes as a matter of fact there is.  Regular leather, studded leather, and reinforced leather (I believe) all have ths same stats in AC and weight, but have
ygData.messageBody:
>> AC IS NOT EVERYTHING! AC is the second half, and the lesser half, of
>> the armor system in Everquest. The first half is damage absorption.
>
>According to Verant, AC _is_ everything. There is no 'intrinsic' damage
>absorption element for different armors. Rather, their relative damage
>absorption and protective effects are stored in the AC value.

Yes as a matter of fact there is. Regular leather, studded leather, and
reinforced leather (I believe) all have ths same stats in AC and weight, but
have incresingly higher damage absorption values. Otherwise, what would be
the point of studded and reinforced leather?
